name: PokeNation
summary:
PokeNation is a project that has originally started back in 2010, but interrupted till the start of 2012. Since the beginning that what we want, is to create is a new Pokemon Online Game, but not just another one! 
We want you to enjoy the real Pokemon gameplay while being able to fully interact with your friends, building an healthy competition.
PokeNation is being programmed in Java, and since the game engine isn't completely done we can't show real content at this moment.
